description: Approval of details pursuant to conditions 05 and 06 of planning permission dated 2nd September 1997 (Ref: 97/0791). Applicants Plan Nos:  CE(1)1/Rev.B; CE(X)1/Rev.B; 2/Rev.B; 3/Rev.B; 10/Rev.B; 11/Rev.B; 334/A8011/Rev.C; A8013/Rev.C; 334/A8012/Rev.F;  A8025/Rev.B; A8028/Rev.A; 9059/CE/L001B; light details.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: A Ginkgo Biloba shall be provided in a suitable planter containing a minimum one cubic metre of soil as a replacement for tree 2 as shown on drawing number CE(1)1/Rev.B. This tree shall be provided in the first available planting season following the date of this notice and shall be replaced if, within five years of planting, the tree dies, is severly damaged or is seriously diseased. 

 REASON: To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
